title: Lyrical School
text:
Lyrical School (stylized as lyrical school) is a Japanese hip hop idol group.
The group was founded in October 2010 under the name Tengal6 (stylized as tengal6, pronounced tengyaru shikksu). On August 1, 2012, it was renamed Lyrical School.


== Members ==
Minan (本多未南, Minan Honda; born on (1990-12-05)December 5, 1990) – joined in July 27, 2013
Sayo - Joined on February 12, 2023
Tmrw - Joined on February 12, 2023
Hana - Joined on February 12, 2023
Mana - Joined on February 12, 2023
Malik - Joined on February 12, 2023
Ryuya - Joined on February 12, 2023
Reina - Joined on February 12, 2023


=== Former members ===
Mariko (工藤まり仔, Mariko Kudō; born on (1988-07-19)July 19, 1988) – graduated on January 26, 2013
Erika (知名えりか, Erika China; born on (1988-01-11)January 11, 1988) – first generation leader, graduated on June 30, 2013 
Hina (小松ひな, Hina Komatsu; born on (1996-06-05)June 5, 1996) – join on March 17, 2013; graduated on December 13, 2015 
Yumi (清水裕美, Hiromi Shimizu; born on (1990-09-19)September 19, 1990) – left in September 2016 
Ayaka (大部彩夏, Ayaka Ōbu; born on (1990-08-31)August 31, 1990) – second generation leader; graduated on February 26, 2017
Mei (芽依, Mei; born on (1991-04-19)April 19, 1991) – graduated on February 26, 2017
Ami (細越麻未, Asami Hosogoe; born on (1991-07-05)July 5, 1991) – graduated on February 26, 2017
Hime (持田妃華, Himeka Mochida; born on (1998-05-14)May 14, 1998) – joined in December 2015 – graduated on July 24, 2022
Hinako – joined on April 18, 2017 – graduated on July 24, 2022
Risano – joined on April 18, 2017 – graduated on July 24, 2022
Yuu – joined on April 18, 2017 – graduated on July 24, 2022
